content: That's great! I'm excited to try out these recipes and cultural events. I'll definitely ask Rachel about more Korean dishes and recipes, and maybe even plan a cooking session together. I'm also curious about the cultural events and festivals in my area, so I'll look into that. By the way, I recently attended a lecture on the history of racial segregation in the United States. The speaker discussed the importance of understanding demographic information and how it affects social and economic outcomes. I was struck by the statistics on education and housing disparities, and it made me realize how much work still needs to be done to address these issues. Can you give me some recommendations for books or documentaries that explore these topics further?
